Title: Tangerines
Writer: Tatjana Mülbeier (idea), Zaza Urushadze (idea), Zaza Urushadze, Artur Veeber (idea)
Actors: Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze, Misha Meskhi, Elmo Nüganen
Plot: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 7 nominations.
